mng: (classical particle similar to 於|于[yu2]) in, at, from, because, than, (classical final particle similar to 嗎|吗[ma5], 吧[ba5], 呢[ne5], expressing question, doubt or astonishment)

exm.mng: apparently, to seem, to appear, as if, seemingly
a tiny bit, very little, next to nothing (idiom)
to care about, equivalent of 在於|在于[zai4 yu2]
due to, to stem from, to go beyond (also fig. beyond reason, expectations etc), to go against (expectations)
